title: A Novel CAD Framework with Visual and Textual Interpretability: Multimodal Insights for Predicting Respiratory Diseases
details: R Mukhlis, S Saleem, H Kwon, J Hussain, AA Aydin… - 2024 8th International …, 2024
abstract: Generating textual interpretability using recent advancements in large language models (LLMs) is crucial for enhancing the efficiency of comprehensive computer- aided diagnosis (CAD) systems. This improves transparency between medical staff …
